title: Eko Eko Azarak: Reborn
original_name: エコエコアザラク REBORN
sinopse:
She appears as if responding to the calls of the darkest sentiments lying in the depths of the human heart! After Kuroi Misa fades away among reverberations of cursed chants, all that is left behind is despair and madness...

(Source: Akita Shoten, translated)
